transcript:
Hello
Hello
Uh mam Pooja ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Haa boliye. Uh Pooja ji mai Romit baat kar raha tha aapka account manager IndiaMART se.
Actually mam aapne ek Romit Nirula aap apne aap me bhi check kar sakti hai mam.
Mera hi name aa raha hoga.
Hmm. Aapka jo IndiaMART ka app hai na usme account manager ki details bhi aati hai number bhi aata hai. To waha se aap check kar sakti hai. To aapne ek concern raise kar rakha tha ki aapko jo paid service ke renewal ke charges aapko pata karne the.
Aur mere aap mere account mere jo manager hai mere senior manager hai Imran sir unse aapki baat chal rahi thi regarding the renewal price. To mam jo hamara actual price jo hum nayi clients ko offer karte hai wo 32000 plus GST hai. And aap being an old customer aapne jo aapne jo pay kiya tha wo I guess same hi price pay kiya tha ek bar mai fir bhi price pata kar leta hu. Kyunki same price me hota hai either less price me hota hai.
Hmm. Sir price kitna mamta hai?
28 plus GST diya hai. 28
Ha to bolo sir se to baat ho rahi thi na Imran se. Ji mam sir se baat ho rahi thi na to wohi same price hai 28000 plus GST.
Ab hamare gateway se bhi karoge to wahi. Aapko jo proposal bheja hai wo IndiaMART ki official email ID se hi bheja hai. And agar aap us proposal pe click bhi karti hai to bhi aapko redirect karega payment gateway se IndiaMART ke.
Thik hai mai check kar leti hu.
Ji mam bilkul check kar lijiye. Aur mai aapse thoda update le lu mam. Concern bhi open hua tha. Kyunki aapka concern bhi open hua tha.
Baki iske liye koi doubt hai to video meeting me connect kar sakte hai. Agar aapko fir bhi kuch issue ya doubt hai to hum bilkul video meeting pe bhi connect kar sakte hai. Imran ji hai line pe. Ji mam Imran ji line pe nahi hai mere sath me hi hai mere manager hai na isliye. Achha.
Hanji mam.
Thik hai mam mai aapko contact karti hu. Agar
Achha mam kal karwa denge aap payment?
Hmm. Thik hai mam.
Abhi concern close kar du? Abhi mai aapka concern close kar du mam?
Nahi.
Thik hai mam koi issue nahi.
Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know paid service renewal charges.



Resolution:

- Informed about renewal price: 28000 plus GST.

- Proposal sent from IndiaMART official email ID.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the proposal.

- Customer will make the payment tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, payment, gst, proposal, account manager
